channel.title: Really need help
channel.description:
I'm just posting this for a mate, seeing as he doesn't have a mopar account/doesn't use it.
"1. How to make an NPC teleport you to another Location after it dies by you 2. How to make an NPC smite your prayer and or Hit through your prayer"
He needs help fixing those things.
